hero.title: Invest with us!
hero.text: Egestas tellus et arcu porta scelerisque. Donec ultrices erat sed lobortis dapibus. Praesent rhoncus erat quam.

text.0: We represent a wide range of investment and financial services in accordance with the norms of Islam and the requirements of the legislation of the Republic of Uzbekistan. Our doors are open to all clients, regardless of religious affiliation.
text.1: Today the company "FALAH INVESTORS" is developing in its segment, setting industry standards that our competitors are guided by.
text.2: Conservative financial policy, constant portfolio growth and stable profitability of investors above bank deposits prove FALAH INVESTORS is a reliable organization that they trust and willing to work with.

headText.1: Offering innovative products and high service.

text.0: Ensuring interaction with clients based on opportunities, identifying individual development paths
text.1: Offering alternative solutions is one of the success factors
text.2: Market research, innovative project - business design, the formation of system integration of the entire innovation cycle up to profit

text.0: Company in Uzbekistan that includes Islamic principles of financing and providing consulting services in the investment field.
text.1: Provide a safe way to store funds and settlements with clients, as we provide a thorough approach to each stage of concluding contracts and preparing all the necessary documentation.
text.2: Offer to become not only Clients, but also partners in business.

safar.title: Safar Taxi
safar.text: A program that provides customers with a convenient and fast solution for intercity and interregional taxi services in Uzbekistan.

artCrafts.title: Art Crafts
artCrafts.text: A service that prints images and graphics in bright, durable and high quality colors directly from the machine onto plaster, wallpaper, wood, clinker, stone, plastic, glass, concrete, many metals and tiles, and other similar materials.

googolplex.title: Googolplex
googolplex.text: A service to optimize processes and allocate resources through the use of effective IT solutions, IT infrastructure and strategy.

tenderzone.title: Tenderzone
tenderzone.text: Convenient and fast tool for sorting lots and market analysis.

subscribe.title: Invest in partnership with FALAH INVESTORS!
